Sector.name: Education policy and administrative management
Sector.description: Education sector policy, planning and programmes; aid to education ministries, administration and management systems; institution capacity building and advice; school management and governance; curriculum and materials development; unspecified education activities.
Sector.category-description: The codes in this category are to be used only when level of education is unspecified or unknown (e.g. training of primary school teachers should be coded under 11220).

Sector.name: Education facilities and training
Sector.description: Educational buildings, equipment, materials; subsidiary services to education (boarding facilities, staff housing); language training; colloquia, seminars, lectures, etc.
Sector.category-description: The codes in this category are to be used only when level of education is unspecified or unknown (e.g. training of primary school teachers should be coded under 11220).

Sector.name: Teacher training
Sector.description: Teacher education (where the level of education is unspecified); in-service and pre-service training; materials development.
Sector.category-description: The codes in this category are to be used only when level of education is unspecified or unknown (e.g. training of primary school teachers should be coded under 11220).

Sector.name: Educational research
Sector.description: Research and studies on education effectiveness, relevance and quality; systematic evaluation and monitoring.
Sector.category-description: The codes in this category are to be used only when level of education is unspecified or unknown (e.g. training of primary school teachers should be coded under 11220).

Sector.name: Primary education
Sector.description: Formal and non-formal primary education for children; all elementary and first cycle systematic instruction; provision of learning materials.

Sector.name: Basic life skills for youth and adults
Sector.description: Formal and non-formal education for basic life skills for young people and adults (adults education); literacy and numeracy training.

Sector.name: Early childhood education
Sector.description: Formal and non-formal pre-school education.

Sector.name: Secondary education
Sector.description: Second cycle systematic instruction at both junior and senior levels.

Sector.name: Vocational training
Sector.description: Elementary vocational training and secondary level technical education; on-the job training; apprenticeships; including informal vocational training.

Sector.name: Higher education
Sector.description: Degree and diploma programmes at universities, colleges and polytechnics; scholarships.

Sector.name: Advanced technical and managerial training
Sector.description: Professional-level vocational training programmes and in-service training.

Sector.name: Health policy and administrative management
Sector.description: Health sector policy, planning and programmes; aid to health ministries, public health administration; institution capacity building and advice; medical insurance programmes; unspecified health activities.

Sector.name: Medical education/training
Sector.description: Medical education and training for tertiary level services.

Sector.name: Medical research
Sector.description: General medical research (excluding basic health research).

Sector.name: Medical services
Sector.description: Laboratories, specialised clinics and hospitals (including equipment and supplies); ambulances; dental services; mental health care; medical rehabilitation; control of non-infectious diseases; drug and substance abuse control [excluding narcotics traffic control (16063)].

Sector.name: Basic health care
Sector.description: Basic and primary health care programmes; paramedical and nursing care programmes; supply of drugs, medicines and vaccines related to basic health care.

Sector.name: Basic health infrastructure
Sector.description: District-level hospitals, clinics and dispensaries and related medical equipment; excluding specialised hospitals and clinics (12191).

Sector.name: Basic nutrition
Sector.description: Direct feeding programmes (maternal feeding, breastfeeding and weaning foods, child feeding, school feeding); determination of micro-nutrient deficiencies; provision of vitamin A, iodine, iron etc.; monitoring of nutritional status; nutrition and food hygiene education; household food security.

Sector.name: Infectious disease control
Sector.description: Immunisation; prevention and control of infectious and parasite diseases, except malaria (12262), tuberculosis (12263), HIV/AIDS and other STDs (13040). It includes diarrheal diseases, vector-borne diseases (e.g. river blindness and guinea worm), viral diseases, mycosis, helminthiasis, zoonosis, diseases by other bacteria and viruses, pediculosis, etc.

Sector.name: Health education
Sector.description: Information, education and training of the population for improving health knowledge and practices; public health and awareness campaigns.

Sector.name: Malaria control
Sector.description: Prevention and control of malaria.

Sector.name: Tuberculosis control
Sector.description: Immunisation, prevention and control of tuberculosis.

Sector.name: Health personnel development
Sector.description: Training of health staff for basic health care services.

Sector.name: Population policy and administrative management
Sector.description: Population/development policies; census work, vital registration; migration data; demographic research/analysis; reproductive health research; unspecified population activities.

Sector.name: Reproductive health care
Sector.description: Promotion of reproductive health; prenatal and postnatal care including delivery; prevention and treatment of infertility; prevention and management of consequences of abortion; safe motherhood activities.

Sector.name: Family planning
Sector.description: Family planning services including counselling; information, education and communication (IEC) activities; delivery of contraceptives; capacity building and training.

Sector.name: STD control including HIV/AIDS
Sector.description: All activities related to sexually transmitted diseases and HIV/AIDS control e.g. information, education and communication; testing; prevention; treatment, care.

Sector.name: Personnel development for population and reproductive health
Sector.description: Education and training of health staff for population and reproductive health care services.

Sector.name: Water resources policy and administrative management
Sector.description: Water sector policy, planning and programmes; water legislation and management; institution capacity building and advice; water supply assessments and studies; groundwater, water quality and watershed studies; hydrogeology; excluding agricultural water resources (31140).

Sector.name: Water resources protection
Sector.description: Inland surface waters (rivers, lakes, etc.); conservation and rehabilitation of ground water; prevention of water contamination from agro-chemicals, industrial effluents.

Sector.name: Water supply and sanitation - large systems
Sector.description: Water desalination plants; intakes, storage, treatment, pumping stations, conveyance and distribution systems; sewerage; domestic and industrial waste water treatment plants.

Sector.name: Basic drinking water supply and basic sanitation
Sector.description: Water supply and sanitation through low-cost technologies such as handpumps, spring catchment, gravity-fed systems, rain water collection, storage tanks, small distribution systems; latrines, small-bore sewers, on-site disposal (septic tanks).

Sector.name: River development
Sector.description: Integrated river basin projects; river flow control; dams and reservoirs [excluding dams primarily for irrigation (31140) and hydropower (23065) and activities related to river transport (21040)].

Sector.name: Waste management/disposal
Sector.description: Municipal and industrial solid waste management, including hazardous and toxic waste; collection, disposal and treatment; landfill areas; composting and reuse.

Sector.name: Education and training in water supply and sanitation
Economic and development policy/planning
Sector.description: Macro-economic, fiscal and monetary policy and planning; social planning; economic and social analysis and forecasting; development planning and preparation of structural reforms; organisational development; support to ministries involved in aid co-ordination; other ministries and government departments when sector cannot be specified. (Use code 51010 for budget support to macroeconomic reforms.)
Sector.category-description: N.B. Use code 51010 for general budget support.

Sector.name: Public sector financial management
Sector.description: Strengthening financial and managerial accountability; public expenditure management; improving financial management systems; tax assessment procedures; budget drafting; field auditing; measures against waste, fraud and corruption.
Sector.category-description: N.B. Use code 51010 for general budget support.

Sector.name: Legal and judicial development
Sector.description: Constitutional development, legal drafting; institutional strengthening of legal and judicial systems; legal training and education; legal advice and services; crime prevention.
Sector.category-description: N.B. Use code 51010 for general budget support.

Sector.name: Government administration
Sector.description: Systems of government including parliament, local government, decentralisation; civil service and civil service reform. Including general services by government (or commissioned by government) not elsewhere specified e.g. police, fire protection; cartography, meteorology, legal metrology, aerial surveys and remote sensing; administrative buildings.
Sector.category-description: N.B. Use code 51010 for general budget support.

Sector.name: Strengthening civil society
Sector.description: Community participation and development; co-operatives; grassroots organisations; development of other participatory planning and decision making procedures and institutions (see code 15220 for civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution).
Sector.category-description: N.B. Use code 51010 for general budget support.

Sector.name: Elections
Sector.description: Electoral assistance and monitoring, voters' education [other than in connection with UN peace building (15230)].
Sector.category-description: N.B. Use code 51010 for general budget support.

Sector.name: Human rights
Sector.description: Monitoring of human rights performance; support for national and regional human rights bodies; protection of ethnic, religious and cultural minorities [other than in connection with UN peace building (15230)].
Sector.category-description: N.B. Use code 51010 for general budget support.

Sector.name: Free flow of information
Sector.description: Uncensored flow of information on public issues, including activities that increase the professionalism, skills and integrity of the print and broadcast media (e.g. training of journalists).
Sector.category-description: N.B. Use code 51010 for general budget support.

Sector.name: Women's equality organisations and institutions
Sector.description: Support for institutions and organisations (governmental and non-governmental) working for gender equality and women's empowerment.
Sector.category-description: N.B. Use code 51010 for general budget support.

Sector.name: Security system management and reform
Sector.description: Technical co-operation provided to parliament, government ministries, law enforcement agencies and the judiciary to assist review and reform of the security system to improve democratic governance and civilian control; technical co-operation provided to government to improve civilian oversight and democratic control of budgeting, management, accountability and auditing of security expenditure, including military budgets, as part of a public expenditure management programme; assistance to civil society to enhance its competence and capacity to scrutinise the security system so that it is managed in accordance with democratic norms and principles of accountability, transparency and good governance.
Sector.category-name: Conflict prevention and resolution, peace and security
Sector.category-description: N.B. Further notes on ODA eligibility (and exclusions) of conflict, peace and security related activities are given in paragraphs 41-46 of the DAC Statistical Reporting Directives.

Sector.name: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
Sector.description: Support for civilian activities related to peace building, conflict prevention and resolution, including capacity building, monitoring, dialogue and information exchange.
Sector.category-name: Conflict prevention and resolution, peace and security
Sector.category-description: N.B. Further notes on ODA eligibility (and exclusions) of conflict, peace and security related activities are given in paragraphs 41-46 of the DAC Statistical Reporting Directives.

Sector.name: Post-conflict peace-building (UN)
Sector.description: Participation in the post-conflict peace-building phase of United Nations peace operations (activities such as human rights and elections monitoring, rehabilitation of demobilised soldiers, rehabilitation of basic national infrastructure, monitoring or retraining of civil administrators and police forces, training in customs and border control procedures, advice or training in fiscal or macroeconomic stabilisation policy, repatriation and demobilisation of armed factions, and disposal of their weapons; support for landmine removal). Direct contributions to the UN peacekeeping budget are excluded from bilateral ODA (they are reportable in part as multilateral ODA).
Sector.category-name: Conflict prevention and resolution, peace and security
Sector.category-description: N.B. Further notes on ODA eligibility (and exclusions) of conflict, peace and security related activities are given in paragraphs 41-46 of the DAC Statistical Reporting Directives.

Sector.name: Reintegration and SALW control
Sector.description: Reintegration of demobilised military personnel into the economy; conversion of production facilities from military to civilian outputs; technical co-operation to control, prevent and/or reduce the proliferation of small arms and light weapons (SALW) - see para. 39 of the DAC Statistical Reporting Directives for definition of SALW activities covered. [Other than in connection with UN peace-building (15230) or child soldiers (15261)].
Sector.category-name: Conflict prevention and resolution, peace and security
Sector.category-description: N.B. Further notes on ODA eligibility (and exclusions) of conflict, peace and security related activities are given in paragraphs 41-46 of the DAC Statistical Reporting Directives.

Sector.name: Land mine clearance
Sector.description: Explosive mine removal for developmental purposes [other than in connection with UN peace-building (15230)].
Sector.category-name: Conflict prevention and resolution, peace and security
Sector.category-description: N.B. Further notes on ODA eligibility (and exclusions) of conflict, peace and security related activities are given in paragraphs 41-46 of the DAC Statistical Reporting Directives.

Sector.name: Child soldiers (Prevention and demobilisation)
Sector.description: Technical co-operation provided to government  and assistance to civil society organisations  to support and apply legislation designed to prevent the recruitment of child soldiers, and to demobilise, disarm, reintegrate, repatriate and resettle (DDR) child soldiers.
Sector.category-name: Conflict prevention and resolution, peace and security
Sector.category-description: N.B. Further notes on ODA eligibility (and exclusions) of conflict, peace and security related activities are given in paragraphs 41-46 of the DAC Statistical Reporting Directives.

Sector.name: Social/ welfare services
Sector.description: Social legislation and administration; institution capacity building and advice; social security and other social schemes; special programmes for the elderly, orphans, the disabled, street children; social dimensions of structural adjustment; unspecified social infrastructure and services, including consumer protection.

Sector.name: Employment policy and administrative management
Sector.description: Employment policy and planning; labour law; labour unions; institution capacity building and advice; support programmes for unemployed; employment creation and income generation programmes; occupational safety and health; combating child labour.

Sector.name: Housing policy and administrative management
Sector.description: Housing sector policy, planning and programmes; excluding low-cost housing and slum clearance (16040).

Sector.name: Low-cost housing
Sector.description: Including slum clearance.

Sector.name: Multisector aid for basic social services
Sector.description: Basic social services are defined to include basic education, basic health, basic nutrition, population/reproductive health and basic drinking water supply and basic sanitation.

Sector.name: Culture and recreation
Sector.description: Including libraries and museums.

Sector.name: Statistical capacity building
Sector.description: Both in national statistical offices and any other government ministries.

Sector.name: Narcotics control
Sector.description: In-country and customs controls including training of the police; educational programmes and awareness campaigns to restrict narcotics traffic and in-country distribution.

Sector.name: Social mitigation of HIV/AIDS
Sector.description: Special programmes to address the consequences of HIV/AIDS, e.g. social, legal and economic assistance to people living with HIV/AIDS including food security and employment; support to vulnerable groups and children orphaned by HIV/AIDS; human rights of HIV/AIDS affected people.

Sector.name: Transport policy and administrative management
Sector.description: Transport sector policy, planning and programmes; aid to transport ministries; institution capacity building and advice; unspecified transport; activities that combine road, rail, water and/or air transport.
Sector.category-description: Note: Manufacturing of transport equipment should be included under code 32172.

Sector.name: Road transport
Sector.description: Road infrastructure, road vehicles; passenger road transport, motor passenger cars.
Sector.category-description: Note: Manufacturing of transport equipment should be included under code 32172.

Sector.name: Rail transport
Sector.description: Rail infrastructure, rail equipment, locomotives, other rolling stock; including light rail (tram) and underground systems.
Sector.category-description: Note: Manufacturing of transport equipment should be included under code 32172.

Sector.name: Water transport
Sector.description: Harbours and docks, harbour guidance systems, ships and boats; river and other inland water transport, inland barges and vessels.
Sector.category-description: Note: Manufacturing of transport equipment should be included under code 32172.

Sector.name: Air transport
Sector.description: Airports, airport guidance systems, aeroplanes, aeroplane maintenance equipment.
Sector.category-description: Note: Manufacturing of transport equipment should be included under code 32172.

Sector.name: Storage
Sector.description: Whether or not related to transportation.
Sector.category-description: Note: Manufacturing of transport equipment should be included under code 32172.

Sector.name: Education and training in transport and storage
Sector.category-description: Note: Manufacturing of transport equipment should be included under code 32172.

Sector.name: Communications policy and administrative management
Sector.description: Communications sector policy, planning and programmes; institution capacity building and advice; including postal services development; unspecified communications activities.

Sector.name: Telecommunications
Sector.description: Telephone networks, telecommunication satellites, earth stations.

Sector.name: Radio/television/print media
Sector.description: Radio and TV links, equipment; newspapers; printing and publishing.

Sector.name: Information and communication technology (ICT)
Sector.description: Computer hardware and software; internet access; IT training. When sector cannot be specified.

Sector.name: Energy policy and administrative management
Sector.description: Energy sector policy, planning and programmes; aid to energy ministries; institution capacity building and advice; unspecified energy activities including energy conservation.
Sector.category-description: Note: Extraction of raw materials for power generation should be included in the mining sector. Energy manufacturing should be included in the industry sector.

Sector.name: Power generation/non-renewable sources
Sector.description: Thermal power plants including when heat source cannot be determined; combined gas-coal power plants.
Sector.category-description: Note: Extraction of raw materials for power generation should be included in the mining sector. Energy manufacturing should be included in the industry sector.

Sector.name: Power generation/renewable sources
Sector.description: Including policy, planning, development programmes, surveys and incentives. Fuelwood/ charcoal production should be included under forestry (31261).
Sector.category-description: Note: Extraction of raw materials for power generation should be included in the mining sector. Energy manufacturing should be included in the industry sector.

Sector.name: Electrical transmission/ distribution
Sector.description: Distribution from power source to end user; transmission lines.
Sector.category-description: Note: Extraction of raw materials for power generation should be included in the mining sector. Energy manufacturing should be included in the industry sector.

Sector.name: Gas distribution
Sector.description: Delivery for use by ultimate consumer.
Sector.category-description: Note: Extraction of raw materials for power generation should be included in the mining sector. Energy manufacturing should be included in the industry sector.

Sector.name: Oil-fired power plants
Sector.description: Including diesel power plants.
Sector.category-description: Note: Extraction of raw materials for power generation should be included in the mining sector. Energy manufacturing should be included in the industry sector.

Sector.name: Gas-fired power plants
Sector.category-description: Note: Extraction of raw materials for power generation should be included in the mining sector. Energy manufacturing should be included in the industry sector.

Sector.name: Coal-fired power plants
Sector.category-description: Note: Extraction of raw materials for power generation should be included in the mining sector. Energy manufacturing should be included in the industry sector.

Sector.name: Nuclear power plants
Sector.description: Including nuclear safety.
Sector.category-description: Note: Extraction of raw materials for power generation should be included in the mining sector. Energy manufacturing should be included in the industry sector.

Sector.name: Hydro-electric power plants
Sector.description: Including power-generating river barges.
Sector.category-description: Note: Extraction of raw materials for power generation should be included in the mining sector. Energy manufacturing should be included in the industry sector.

Sector.name: Geothermal energy
Sector.category-description: Note: Extraction of raw materials for power generation should be included in the mining sector. Energy manufacturing should be included in the industry sector.

Sector.name: Solar energy
Sector.description: Including photo-voltaic cells, solar thermal applications and solar heating.
Sector.category-description: Note: Extraction of raw materials for power generation should be included in the mining sector. Energy manufacturing should be included in the industry sector.

Sector.name: Wind power
Sector.description: Wind energy for water lifting and electric power generation.
Sector.category-description: Note: Extraction of raw materials for power generation should be included in the mining sector. Energy manufacturing should be included in the industry sector.

Sector.name: Ocean power
Sector.description: Including ocean thermal energy conversion, tidal and wave power.
Sector.category-description: Note: Extraction of raw materials for power generation should be included in the mining sector. Energy manufacturing should be included in the industry sector.

Sector.name: Biomass
Sector.description: Densification technologies and use of biomass for direct power generation including biogas, gas obtained from sugar cane and other plant residues, anaerobic digesters.
Sector.category-description: Note: Extraction of raw materials for power generation should be included in the mining sector. Energy manufacturing should be included in the industry sector.

Sector.name: Energy education/training
Sector.description: Applies to all energy sub-sectors; all levels of training.
Sector.category-description: Note: Extraction of raw materials for power generation should be included in the mining sector. Energy manufacturing should be included in the industry sector.

Sector.name: Energy research
Sector.description: Including general inventories, surveys.
Sector.category-description: Note: Extraction of raw materials for power generation should be included in the mining sector. Energy manufacturing should be included in the industry sector.

Sector.name: Financial policy and administrative management
Sector.description: Finance sector policy, planning and programmes; institution capacity building and advice; financial markets and systems.

Sector.name: Monetary institutions
Sector.description: Central banks.

Sector.name: Formal sector financial intermediaries
Sector.description: All formal sector financial intermediaries; credit lines; insurance, leasing, venture capital, etc. (except when focused on only one sector).

Sector.name: Informal/semi-formal financial intermediaries
Sector.description: Micro credit, savings and credit co-operatives etc.

Sector.name: Education/training in banking and financial services
Business support services and institutions
Sector.description: Support to trade and business associations, chambers of commerce; legal and regulatory reform aimed at improving business and investment climate; private sector institution capacity building and advice; trade information; public-private sector networking including trade fairs; e?commerce. Where sector cannot be specified: general support to private sector enterprises (in particular, use code 32130 for enterprises in the industrial sector).

Sector.name: Privatisation
Sector.description: When sector cannot be specified. Including general state enterprise restructuring or demonopolisation programmes; planning, programming, advice.

Sector.name: Agricultural policy and administrative management
Sector.description: Agricultural sector policy, planning and programmes; aid to agricultural ministries; institution capacity building and advice; unspecified agriculture.

Sector.name: Agricultural development
Sector.description: Integrated projects; farm development.

Sector.name: Agricultural land resources
Sector.description: Including soil degradation control; soil improvement; drainage of water logged areas; soil desalination; agricultural land surveys; land reclamation; erosion control, desertification control.

Sector.name: Agricultural water resources
Sector.description: Irrigation, reservoirs, hydraulic structures, ground water exploitation for agricultural use.

Sector.name: Agricultural inputs
Sector.description: Supply of seeds, fertilizers, agricultural machinery/equipment.

Sector.name: Food crop production
Sector.description: Including grains (wheat, rice, barley, maize, rye, oats, millet, sorghum); horticulture; vegetables; fruit and berries; other annual and perennial crops. [Use code 32161 for agro-industries.]

Sector.name: Industrial crops/export crops
Sector.description: Including sugar; coffee, cocoa, tea; oil seeds, nuts, kernels; fibre crops; tobacco; rubber. [Use code 32161 for agro-industries.]

Sector.name: Livestock
Sector.description: Animal husbandry; animal feed aid.

Sector.name: Agrarian reform
Sector.description: Including agricultural sector adjustment.

Sector.name: Agricultural alternative development
Sector.description: Projects to reduce illicit drug cultivation through other agricultural marketing and production opportunities (see code 43050 for non-agricultural alternative development).

Sector.name: Agricultural extension
Sector.description: Non-formal training in agriculture.

Sector.name: Agricultural research
Sector.description: Plant breeding, physiology, genetic resources, ecology, taxonomy, disease control, agricultural bio-technology; including livestock research (animal health, breeding and genetics, nutrition, physiology).

Sector.name: Agricultural services
Sector.description: Marketing policies and organisation; storage and transportation, creation of strategic reserves.

Sector.name: Plant and post-harvest protection and pest control
Sector.description: Including integrated plant protection, biological plant protection activities, supply and management of agrochemicals, supply of pesticides, plant protection policy and legislation.

Sector.name: Agricultural financial services
Sector.description: Financial intermediaries for the agricultural sector including credit schemes; crop insurance.

Sector.name: Agricultural co-operatives
Sector.description: Including farmersÂ’ organisations.

Sector.name: Livestock/veterinary services
Sector.description: Animal health and management, genetic resources, feed resources.

Sector.name: Forestry policy and administrative management
Sector.description: Forestry sector policy, planning and programmes; institution capacity building and advice; forest surveys; unspecified forestry and agro-forestry activities.

Sector.name: Forestry development
Sector.description: Afforestation for industrial and rural consumption; exploitation and utilisation; erosion control, desertification control; integrated forestry projects.

Sector.name: Fuelwood/charcoal
Sector.description: Forestry development whose primary purpose is production of fuelwood and charcoal.

Sector.name: Forestry research
Sector.description: Including artificial regeneration, genetic improvement, production methods, fertilizer, harvesting.

Sector.name: Fishing policy and administrative management
Sector.description: Fishing sector policy, planning and programmes; institution capacity building and advice; ocean and coastal fishing; marine and freshwater fish surveys and prospecting; fishing boats/equipment; unspecified fishing activities.

Sector.name: Fishery development
Sector.description: Exploitation and utilisation of fisheries; fish stock protection; aquaculture; integrated fishery projects.

Sector.name: Fishery research
Sector.description: Pilot fish culture; marine/freshwater biological research.

Sector.name: Fishery services
Sector.description: Fishing harbours; fish markets; fishery transport and cold storage.

Sector.name: Industrial policy and administrative management
Sector.description: Industrial sector policy, planning and programmes; institution capacity building and advice; unspecified industrial activities; manufacturing of goods not specified below.
Sector.category-description: Only includes aid to production or manufacturing. Provision of finished products should be included under relevant sector.

Sector.name: Industrial development
Sector.category-description: Only includes aid to production or manufacturing. Provision of finished products should be included under relevant sector.

Sector.name: Small and medium-sized enterprises (SME) development
Sector.description: Direct support to the development of small and medium-sized enterprises in the industrial sector, including accounting, auditing and advisory services.
Sector.category-description: Only includes aid to production or manufacturing. Provision of finished products should be included under relevant sector.

Sector.name: Cottage industries and handicraft
Sector.category-description: Only includes aid to production or manufacturing. Provision of finished products should be included under relevant sector.

Sector.name: Agro-industries
Sector.description: Staple food processing, dairy products, slaughter houses and equipment, meat and fish processing and preserving, oils/fats, sugar refineries, beverages/tobacco, animal feeds production.
Sector.category-description: Only includes aid to production or manufacturing. Provision of finished products should be included under relevant sector.

Sector.name: Forest industries
Sector.description: Wood production, pulp/paper production.
Sector.category-description: Only includes aid to production or manufacturing. Provision of finished products should be included under relevant sector.

Sector.name: Textiles, leather and substitutes
Sector.description: Including knitting factories.
Sector.category-description: Only includes aid to production or manufacturing. Provision of finished products should be included under relevant sector.

Sector.name: Chemicals
Sector.description: Industrial and non-industrial production facilities; includes pesticides production.
Sector.category-description: Only includes aid to production or manufacturing. Provision of finished products should be included under relevant sector.

Sector.name: Fertilizer plants
Sector.category-description: Only includes aid to production or manufacturing. Provision of finished products should be included under relevant sector.

Sector.name: Cement/lime/plaster
Sector.category-description: Only includes aid to production or manufacturing. Provision of finished products should be included under relevant sector.

Sector.name: Energy manufacturing
Sector.description: Including gas liquefaction; petroleum refineries.
Sector.category-description: Only includes aid to production or manufacturing. Provision of finished products should be included under relevant sector.

Sector.name: Pharmaceutical production
Sector.description: Medical equipment/supplies; drugs, medicines, vaccines; hygienic products.
Sector.category-description: Only includes aid to production or manufacturing. Provision of finished products should be included under relevant sector.

Sector.name: Basic metal industries
Sector.description: Iron and steel, structural metal production.
Sector.category-description: Only includes aid to production or manufacturing. Provision of finished products should be included under relevant sector.

Sector.name: Non-ferrous metal industries
Sector.category-description: Only includes aid to production or manufacturing. Provision of finished products should be included under relevant sector.

Sector.name: Engineering
Sector.description: Manufacturing of electrical and non-electrical machinery, engines/turbines.
Sector.category-description: Only includes aid to production or manufacturing. Provision of finished products should be included under relevant sector.

Sector.name: Transport equipment industry
Sector.description: Shipbuilding, fishing boats building; railroad equipment; motor vehicles and motor passenger cars; aircraft; navigation/guidance systems.
Sector.category-description: Only includes aid to production or manufacturing. Provision of finished products should be included under relevant sector.

Sector.name: Technological research and development
Sector.description: Including industrial standards; quality management; metrology; testing; accreditation; certification.
Sector.category-description: Only includes aid to production or manufacturing. Provision of finished products should be included under relevant sector.

Sector.name: Mineral/mining policy and administrative management
Sector.description: Mineral and mining sector policy, planning and programmes; mining legislation, mining cadastre, mineral resources inventory, information systems, institution capacity building and advice; unspecified mineral resources exploitation.

Sector.name: Mineral prospection and exploration
Sector.description: Geology, geophysics, geochemistry; excluding hydrogeology (14010) and environmental geology (41010), mineral extraction and processing, infrastructure, technology, economics, safety and environment management.

Sector.name: Coal
Sector.description: Including lignite and peat.

Sector.name: Oil and gas
Sector.description: Petroleum, natural gas, condensates, liquefied petroleum gas (LPG), liquefied natural gas (LNG); including drilling and production.

Sector.name: Ferrous metals
Sector.description: Iron and ferro-alloy metals.

Sector.name: Nonferrous metals
Sector.description: Aluminium, copper, lead, nickel, tin, zinc.

Sector.name: Precious metals/materials
Sector.description: Gold, silver, platinum, diamonds, gemstones.

Sector.name: Industrial minerals
Sector.description: Baryte, limestone, feldspar, kaolin, sand, gypsym, gravel, ornamental stones.

Sector.name: Fertilizer minerals
Sector.description: Phosphates, potash.

Sector.name: Offshore minerals
Sector.description: Polymetallic nodules, phosphorites, marine placer deposits.

Sector.name: Construction policy and administrative management
Sector.description: Construction sector policy and planning; excluding construction activities within specific sectors (e.g., hospital or school construction).

Sector.name: Trade policy and administrative management
Sector.description: Trade policy and planning; support to ministries and departments responsible for trade policy; trade-related legislation and regulatory reforms; policy analysis and implementation of multilateral trade agreements e.g. technical barriers to trade and sanitary and phytosanitary measures (TBT/SPS) except at regional level (see 33130); mainstreaming trade in national development strategies (e.g. poverty reduction strategy papers); wholesale/retail trade; unspecified trade and trade promotion activities.
Sector.category-name: TRADE POLICY AND REGULATIONS AND TRADE-RELATED ADJUSTMENT

Sector.name: Trade facilitation
Sector.description: Simplification and harmonisation of international import and export procedures (e.g. customs valuation, licensing procedures, transport formalities, payments, insurance); support to customs departments; tariff reforms.
Sector.category-name: TRADE POLICY AND REGULATIONS AND TRADE-RELATED ADJUSTMENT

Sector.name: Regional trade agreements (RTAs)
Sector.description: Support to regional trade arrangements [e.g. Southern African Development Community (SADC), Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN), Free Trade Area of the Americas (FTAA), African Caribbean Pacific/European Union (ACP/EU)], including work on technical barriers to trade and sanitary and phytosanitary measures (TBT/SPS) at regional level; elaboration of rules of origin and introduction of special and differential treatment in RTAs.
Sector.category-name: TRADE POLICY AND REGULATIONS AND TRADE-RELATED ADJUSTMENT

Sector.name: Multilateral trade negotiations
Sector.description: Support developing countries' effective participation in multilateral trade negotiations, including training of negotiators, assessing impacts of negotiations; accession to the World Trade Organisation (WTO) and other multilateral trade-related organisations.
Sector.category-name: TRADE POLICY AND REGULATIONS AND TRADE-RELATED ADJUSTMENT

Sector.name: Trade-related adjustment
Sector.description: Contributions to the government budget to assist the implementation of recipients' own trade reforms and adjustments to trade policy measures by other countries; assistance to manage shortfalls in the balance of payments due to changes in the world trading environment.
Sector.category-name: TRADE POLICY AND REGULATIONS AND TRADE-RELATED ADJUSTMENT

Sector.name: Trade education/training
Sector.description: Human resources development in trade not included under any of the above codes. Includes university programmes in trade.
Sector.category-name: TRADE POLICY AND REGULATIONS AND TRADE-RELATED ADJUSTMENT

Sector.name: Environmental policy and administrative management
Sector.description: Environmental policy, laws, regulations and economic instruments; administrational institutions and practices; environmental and land use planning and decision-making procedures; seminars, meetings; miscellaneous conservation and protection measures not specified below.
Sector.category-description: Non-sector specific.

Sector.name: Biosphere protection
Sector.description: Air pollution control, ozone layer preservation; marine pollution control.
Sector.category-description: Non-sector specific.

Sector.name: Bio-diversity
Sector.description: Including natural reserves and actions in the surrounding areas; other measures to protect endangered or vulnerable species and their habitats (e.g. wetlands preservation).
Sector.category-description: Non-sector specific.

Sector.name: Site preservation
Sector.description: Applies to unique cultural landscape; including sites/objects of historical, archeological, aesthetic, scientific or educational value.
Sector.category-description: Non-sector specific.

Sector.name: Flood prevention/control
Sector.description: Floods from rivers or the sea; including sea water intrusion control and sea level rise related activities.
Sector.category-description: Non-sector specific.

Sector.name: Environmental education/ training
Sector.category-description: Non-sector specific.

Sector.name: Environmental research
Sector.description: Including establishment of databases, inventories/accounts of physical and natural resources; environmental profiles and impact studies if not sector specific.
Sector.category-description: Non-sector specific.

Sector.name: Urban development and management
Sector.description: Integrated urban development projects; local development and urban management; urban infrastructure and services; municipal finances; urban environmental management; urban development and planning; urban renewal and urban housing; land information systems.

Sector.name: Rural development
Sector.description: Integrated rural development projects; e.g. regional development planning; promotion of decentralised and multi-sectoral competence for planning, co-ordination and management; implementation of regional development and measures (including natural reserve management); land management; land use planning; land settlement and resettlement activities [excluding resettlement of refugees and internally displaced persons (72010)]; functional integration of rural and urban areas; geographical information systems.

Sector.name: Non-agricultural alternative development
Sector.description: Projects to reduce illicit drug cultivation through, for example, non-agricultural income opportunities, social and physical infrastructure (see code 31165 for agricultural alternative development).

Sector.name: Multisector education/training
Sector.description: Including scholarships.

Sector.name: Research/scientific institutions
Sector.description: When sector cannot be identified.

Sector.name: General budget support
Sector.description: Unearmarked contributions to the government budget; support for the implementation of macroeconomic reforms (structural adjustment programmes, poverty reduction strategies); general programme assistance (when not allocable by sector).
Sector.category-description: Budget support in the form of sector-wide approaches (SWAps) should be included in the respective sectors.

Sector.name: Food aid/Food security programmes
Sector.description: Supply of edible human food under national or international programmes including transport costs; cash payments made for food supplies; project food aid and food aid for market sales when benefiting sector not specified; excluding emergency food aid.

Sector.name: Import support (capital goods)
Sector.description: Capital goods and services; lines of credit.
Sector.category-description: Non-food commodity assistance (when benefiting sector not specified).

Sector.name: Import support (commodities)
Sector.description: Commodities, general goods and services, oil imports.
Sector.category-description: Non-food commodity assistance (when benefiting sector not specified).

Sector.name: Action relating to debt
Sector.description: Actions falling outside the code headings below; training in debt management.

Sector.name: Relief of multilateral debt
Sector.description: Grants or credits to cover debt owed to multilateral financial institutions; including contributions to Heavily Indebted Poor Countries (HIPC) Trust Fund.

Sector.name: Debt for development swap
Sector.description: Allocation of debt claims to use for development (e.g., debt for education, debt for environment).

Sector.name: Other debt swap
Sector.description: Where the debt swap benefits an external agent i.e. is not specifically for development purposes.

Sector.name: Debt buy-back
Sector.description: Purchase of debt for the purpose of cancellation.

Sector.name: Material relief assistance and services
Sector.description: Shelter, water, sanitation and health services, supply of medicines and other non-food relief items; assistance to refugees and internally displaced people in developing countries other than for food (72040) or protection (72050).
Sector.category-description: An emergency is a situation which results from man made crises and/or natural disasters.

Sector.name: Emergency food aid
Sector.description: Food aid normally for general free distribution or special supplementary feeding programmes; short-term relief to targeted population groups affected by emergency situations. Excludes non-emergency food security assistance programmes/food aid (52010).
Sector.category-description: An emergency is a situation which results from man made crises and/or natural disasters.

Sector.name: Relief co-ordination; protection and support services
Sector.description: Measures to co-ordinate delivery of humanitarian aid, including logistics and communications systems; measures to promote and protect the safety, well-being, dignity and integrity of civilians and those no longer taking part in hostilities. (Activities designed to protect the security of persons or property through the use or display of force are not reportable as ODA.)
Sector.category-description: An emergency is a situation which results from man made crises and/or natural disasters.

Sector.name: Reconstruction relief and rehabilitation
Sector.description: Short-term reconstruction work after emergency or conflict limited to restoring pre-existing infrastructure (e.g. repair or construction of roads, bridges and ports, restoration of essential facilities, such as water and sanitation, shelter, health care services); social and economic rehabilitation in the aftermath of emergencies to facilitate transition and enable populations to return to their previous livelihood or develop a new livelihood in the wake of an emergency situation (e.g. trauma counselling and treatment, employment programmes).
Sector.category-description: This relates to activities during and in the aftermath of an emergency situation. Longer-term activities to improve the level of infrastructure or social services should be reported under the relevant economic and social sector codes. See also guideline on distinguishing humanitarian from sector-allocable aid.

Sector.name: Disaster prevention and preparedness
Sector.description: Disaster risk reduction activities (e.g. developing knowledge, natural risks cartography, legal norms for construction); early warning systems; emergency contingency stocks and contingency planning including preparations for forced displacement.
Sector.category-description: See codes 41050 and 15220 for prevention of floods and conflicts.

Sector.name: Support to national NGOs
Sector.description: In the donor country.

Sector.name: Support to local and regional NGOs
Sector.description: In the recipient country or region.

Sector.name: Sectors not specified
Sector.description: Contributions to general development of the recipient should be included under programme assistance (51010).

Sector.name: Promotion of development awareness
Sector.description: Spending in donor country for heightened awareness/interest in development co-operation (brochures, lectures, special research projects, etc.).
